Speaker: alexander salkind
Dialogue: presents SUPERGIRL

Speaker: teacher
Dialogue: And now, who can give me the electron wave functions for Kryptonian covalent bonding?

Speaker: child
Dialogue: The cube root of the wavelength over the natural log of the integral of the speed of light squared.

Speaker: teacher
Dialogue: Well, maybe that was a bit too easy...

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: What are you making:

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: It's going to be a tree, I think.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: It's something they have on Earth. You know, where your cousin went.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Didn't you study six-dimensional geometry in school?

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: Yes, I know the equations---I just can't see it in my head.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Even I have trouble with that sometimes. Earth is in outer space. And we're in inner space.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: I don't understand.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Wait till you're older. Here -- watch this.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: You see, a tree is a living thing.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: Can you create life?

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: No, no, just the illusion of life. A kind of half-life, maybe. A pale shadow of the real thing. But it is lovely, the way the light plays over the surface. . .

Speaker: alura
Dialogue: Kara, you shouldn't be so near the Edge without a grown-up.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: I'm sorry, Mother.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: I was keeping an eye on her.

Speaker: alura
Dialogue: Thank you, Zaltar, but she has to obey the rules.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: You and your husband have been kind to me, Alura. I have something to tell you: I'm going away. Soon.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Put your fingers there, Kara. And press hard.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Good. Now, go make something pretty.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: I've discovered a new way into the Phantom Zone.

Speaker: alura
Dialogue: But the phantom Zone is for criminals.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: It's big. And empty. I'm tired of limiting myself to  Argo City. I want to do something new. I'm starting to repeat myself here with this airy, glittery stuff....

Speaker: alura
Dialogue: But Zaltar---you founded the city! It's yours. We were all just refugees from Krypton when you gathered us together and brought us here, to the inner dimension. You can't abandon us now. You have a responsibility to us!

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: I'm an artist, Alura. My work comes first. Other people come second.

Speaker: alura
Dialogue: How can you create beauty...with a selfish heart? The spiky insect-creature flies closer and closer around the little girl's head, buzzing angrily. Her look of delight turns to fear. She tries to shoo the creature away. It flies off toward the thin membrane that encloses the city.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: I'm sorry... I didn't know.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: It was my fault. You aren't old enough to use the wand. I shouldn't have given it to you.

Speaker: alura
Dialogue: But the Power Source, Zaltar.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: It couldn't be helped. The city will have to make do with three.

Speaker: alura
Dialogue: But what will happen?

Speaker: george
Dialogue: You sure are a good cook, Selena. Man, that looks too pretty to eat.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Better eat it quick. It won't look too pretty when it's all covered with ants.

Speaker: george
Dialogue: Selena, I've been thinking. It's time I settled down---and I don't know a nicer lady to settle down with than you.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Why George, are you proposing?

Speaker: george
Dialogue: Marry me, Selena. The hardware store doesn't bring in much now, but...

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: George---I thought you'd never ask.

Speaker: george
Dialogue: What the heck is that?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: A squirrel Frisbee?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: That's funny. I'd swear I know just what this is, but I've never seen it before.

Speaker: george
Dialogue: Hey, where you going?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I've got things to do.

Speaker: alura
Dialogue: But Kara, you are too young to go.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: I am almost an adult. This is what I want.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: It was my fault we lost the Power Source.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: I allowed it to escape the City.

Speaker: alura
Dialogue: Ever since we told you how your cousin Superman was sent there as an infant, all you have wanted to do was visit this place.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: Yes, I do want to go. But someone must go. Our scanning shows the Power Source has finally reached the Earth. It could destroy everything unless someone brings it back.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: Why haven't you been able to contact him? He should have returned from the neutron galaxy ages ago. He may be dead. ZOR-EL But what can you, a mere girl-

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: I'll have super powers there. Like him. We can't wait. Our lights are fading. Look around you. When I was a child the City was bright and shining. Look at it now.

Speaker: alura
Dialogue: What do your teachers think?

Speaker: teacher
Dialogue: It would be sad to lose one of our finest young ones to the dimension barrier-- but the City cannot last much longer without the Power Source. It is her future she's fighting for, Zor-El.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: Don't worry, Mother, I'll be all right. I've studied the transmissions from Earth. I know their customs.

Speaker: alura
Dialogue: But they are such strange, unstable people.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: Then I will learn to act strange like them.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: I have made clothing and copies of their money, I will be fine.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: As brave as my father. As wise.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Be careful. Nigel is going to try something.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Don't worry about old Nigel, I can take care of him. He's just a sore loser.

Speaker: elderly man
Dialogue: I don't want much, Selena. I have simple tastes.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I'm sorry, but I already promised Bianca she could have Switzerland. You know how she loves to ski.

Speaker: elderly man
Dialogue: No problem. She can have it. I hate mountains.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: It may well be. I know how you won that election Selena. You can't fool me.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I have plans Nigel. You could come with me... I'm going places.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: You're not going anywhere. Except back to nowheresville. You're too impatient, Selena. Look around you--all these people have served years and years of apprenticeship. Some of their families have been in the Craft for generations. You can't join and take over our whole organization in a few months.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I just did. Because I have the Power.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: You're going to pay a terrible price. The power of Shadow is tricky. Use it too much and it takes over.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Bianca's taught me all! need to know. I'll be safe, as long as I don't go too far.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: Cigarette?

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: Sorry. Forgot you were trying to quit.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Nigel, get out of here. And don't come slithering back. Nigel shakes his head.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: You need me, Selena. I'm the only one who can save you from a terrible fate.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I need you like an Eskimo needs a lawnmower. Now burn rubber.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: Make me.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: Balefire on you, Selena!

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: You Scorpios can never take a joke.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: You think you are on top now. Well there is someone coming to challenge you. I saw it in the cards this morning.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: You won't last a year, Selena. The cards don't lie!

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Let's not let one rotten apple spoil the party. I give you the first woman in eight hundred years to head the Circle: Selena!

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Thank you, sisters and brothers of the Craft. It is a great honor you have given me, and I will try to be worthy. And when my secret plans are revealed -- you will learn that we are on the threshold of power and influence undreamed of when Nigel was our leader.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: And now, ,I call upon the Great Mother--the spirit of Nature --- to bless all our endeavors in the coming year...

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: It's a warning, that's for sure.

Speaker: elderly man
Dialogue: Maybe it was just an accident.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: There's no such thing as an accident. Everything has meaning, if you can read the signs.

Speaker: elderly man
Dialogue: Then what does it mean???

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Don't ask me. I can't read the signs worth spit.

Speaker: myra
Dialogue: Geeze, another barfy new student. They're really scraping the bottom of the barrel these days.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Oh, yes. Knocking. The pre-entry signal. I forgot.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: The letter's in your files. Under K, for Kent.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: I mean, it would probably be there, if you received it.

Speaker: mr danvers
Dialogue: ...since your school records were lost in the fire, we'11 start you out easy first. You'll have English, Latin, French, History, Art, Chemistry, Math, Biology and Computing. Later on, you can add some electives. I think we'll put you in "G" dorm.

Speaker: student monitor
Dialogue: Man on the floor!

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Oh, MR. Danvers, come in and park it.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: It wasn't anorexia. It was the food.

Speaker: mr danvers
Dialogue: Linda, this is Lucy Lane. You can room with her. Show her around, Lucy; I believe you know her cousin, MR., uh, Kent. Lucy turns into a bundle of enthusiasm. She grabs Linda's suitcase and leads her into the room chattering away excitedly.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Wow, you're Clark's cousin?? Fabuloso! Clark's a hunk. My sister Lois was a real nerd to let that one get away. You'll love it here, we have a great dorm, some really insane characters, I mean radical craziness...

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: No sweat. When's the rest of your stuff arriving?

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: This is all your clothes?

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: I have money to buy more, but I haven't had a chance since...

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Since what?? Did you have a fire at your house or something?

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: I'd rather not talk about it.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: You're not...an orphan are you?

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: My cousin Clark is my only relative on Earth.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Oh wow, I should've known. Me and my big mouth. Listen, you can borrow any of my clothes you want. Any time.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Thank you. You're very kind.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: I'm real sorry, Linda, I should've known it was something tragic if you show up without a wardrobe. Here, try on this. And this.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: She did that deliberately.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: She's a beast.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Must've been a defective puck.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Keep an eye peeled for Myra. She's out to get you.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: She just hates anybody who isn't afraid of her.

Speaker: myra
Dialogue: Are they in?

Speaker: myra
Dialogue: Listen to the screams when I shut off the cold water.

Speaker: muffy
Dialogue: But, Myra, why don't you shut off the hot water and give them an ice bath? If you shut off the cold it, could scald them.

Speaker: myra
Dialogue: So they lose a little skin. Serve 'em right.

Speaker: mr danvers
Dialogue: Now, this is the kind of problem that used to take weeks before the computer. It still takes a long time without certain algorithms.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Uh, yes, MR. Danvers.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I said stop, I didn't say run into a brick wall.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: The Coffer of Shadow. Look at it.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: The danger. The one Nigel spoke of. It must be near .

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Oh, fiddlesticks. What could be dangerous about a baseball game?

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Softball.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: It must be the girls. One of the girls.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Drive on. We have already attracted enough attention.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: We'll bide our time and keep watch. Young girls just can't keep a secret. If one of them's up to something--we'll find out.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: And then, like great cats---we pounce! And destroy!

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Bianca, try not to be so bloodthirsty when you're at the wheel. OK?

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Hey, Linda, you in there?

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: You're a maniac! Let me do it for you. You'll look awful.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I can manage, thanks.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: I cut my own hair once. I looked so awful the only thing was to go totally punk!

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Your hair looks the same.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: It was just a trim.

Speaker: jody
Dialogue: Hey guys, Gloria just got a package from home.

Speaker: jody
Dialogue: A hair dryer that makes popcorn!

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: No thanks. You go on.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: You sure?

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Mother! Is it you? Where are you???

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Mother, this world is so big. I don't know where to begin to look.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: But why? I have super powers. Nothing can hurt me.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Is he your entertainment for tonight?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: He will be. In about five minutes.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Have fun.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Well, there's several ways to go .

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Come in, have a drink, we'll talk.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: You must be very popular in the neighborhood. I always see your truck parked around.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I have a lot of repeat business. People seem to like my service.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I bet they do.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: What's that big black scar on the ground? Like a fire.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Oh, you know how parties are. Always some damage.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Now we could put in rhododendrons or lilacs...depending on how alkaline your soil is.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Uh, no thanks, I don't drink during the day.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: But look, it's almost sundown!

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Really, I'm not thirsty. Now I could put in some honeysuckle there and there...

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Just take a sip or .I'll be hurt. It's an old family recipe, I'm famous for them.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: A passionfruit smoothee.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Well, just one.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: To us. And to the seeds we'll plant together.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Now, about my fee...

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Sleep well. And when you wake, drown in my eyes and be all mine.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: If that's the Jehovah's Witnesses again...

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Don't go away, gorgeous. I'll be right back.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: I have to talk to you.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: You're wasting your breath.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: You used to listen to me. When you asked me to teach you something of the Craft.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I could teach you a thing or two now.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: ...trust the wisdom of the ancients, trust the Great Mother to protect us... Why. are you staring at me like that?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I was just thinking, if I had your skin problems, I'd use a good tannisroot ointment. Every night.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: Nothing's wrong with my skin.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Such a shame. You ought to take better care of yourself.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Thank you both so much. It was a lovely lunch, Mrs. Danvers. I had a wonderful time. And you're a terrific chess player MR. Danvers.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Sure. Mate in five moves.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: ...and there goes my king. Got to hand it to you, I didn't see it coming. Well, bye.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Show me Ethan.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Linda babes! There's this all-night party at Eddie's... his folks are away...

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Go back, sign in, and climb out the bathroom window. McCloskey's always zonked out: she'll never hear you.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: It doesn't seem right.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Please, as a favour to me? So I won't  be the only girl?

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: What a space cadet.  Hey, you dingleberry! Get outta the street!

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: I dunno, but he's gonna get creamed.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Power of Shadows...bring him to me.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Omigod, it's a runaway!

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Somebody's gotta do something!!

Speaker: mother
Dialogue: My baby!!!!!

Speaker: mother
Dialogue: My baby.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Everything's going to be all right. She's just unconscious. No broken bones.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: That was meant for me!

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Thank you. I'm going to close this up again.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Wait...don't leave me in here...

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: It's for your own protection.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I'm taking you to the hospital.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Let me out. I have to talk to you.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Later.

Speaker: policeman
Dialogue: Where's the casualties? You can't tell me there's no casualties.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: It's what we were warned about.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: When can I see, you again ?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Relax. Tomorrow this will all seem like a bad dream. Goodbye.

Speaker: first intern
Dialogue: Did we use the laughing gas tonight?

Speaker: first intern
Dialogue: Then this is really happening.

Speaker: second intern
Dialogue: Hey fella, can you talk???

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: The girl. Where is she? It never hit me like this before. I love her. My angel.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Where is she? I love her, don't you understand? I'll die if I can't have her.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: No, not her. The blonde, the one who carried us through the air:. She can fly. She's an angel.

Speaker: second intern
Dialogue: This is Stenzl in Emergency. We got

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: No! She's real ! I saw her !

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Why did she have to show up now?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: That's easy for you to say, Bianca.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: You can do it. You're the most powerful woman on Earth.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Yes! You own the Coffer of Shadow. Nothing can withstand its power.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: That moment is now! What good is a sword unless it be unsheathed? Use it, and no one will dare oppose you again. No one.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: The Naming of Names is not necessary. Just concentrate on her face. Your Shadow will do the rest.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Power of Shadow hear me. Find her wherever she be. Find her and destroy her.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Next time, remind me to do this out in the yard.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Yes, of course, it was foolish of me.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I think I'd better keep it.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Whatever you say.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Hey, that's my roommate's car!

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Leave this place and do no harm.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I didn't want anyone to know... but I was so tired...forgot...

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Just need rest, that's all. Sorry about all the damage outside. I had to fight some terrible thing...

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: An evil force. Trying to destroy me.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Thank you, Mr. Danvers.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: ...come see me. And smuggle in a pint, they won't let me have anything, but make sure it's Jamocha Almond Fudge . . Listen, I got to run, my roommate just walked in. Bye.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Hey, Linda-babes! I've got so much to tell you, I don't know where to begin! Oh -- this is Jimmy Olsen, he works with Clark and my sister at the newspaper.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Nice to meet you. Lucy's told me all about you. Your cousin Clark taught me everything I know about the newspaper business.

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: I'm afraid I have some bad news about your car.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Mr. Danvers called. I'll get a new one with the insurance money. B.F.D.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Do you have any theories about last night?

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Theories?

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: How Lucy and that guy got to the hospital. And all that damage at the school. The police are calling it a freak tornado. I'd like to interview you for the Daily- -

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: -- Planet. I mean, you were there. Do you think it was natural, or like some people are claiming, supernatural?

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: I believe there's a rational explanation for everything. But I don't know what it is.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Can I quote you?

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Jimmy, would you please put those poor flowers in water before they die?

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Oh, sure.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Listen, I know I've been saying you ought party more, but keep your hands off this one, will yak? He's private property. I've been waiting years for him to develop.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Nice? He's cute enough to melt lead!

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Where is your cousin Clark, by the way?

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: He's off doing a top secret uh, investigation.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: I knew it ! He's working on a  hot scoop !

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Oh no, not you again.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: What an adorable hat.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: And you think you're in love.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: This "love" of yours will soon wear off. I gave you a temporary love potion.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Why should I believe you?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Then I'm not the only one who saw her. You did too!

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: But she is real, it wasn't just a concussion.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Forget her, you're mine. I saw you first.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: You can't escape from me that easily. I'm afraid you don't know who I am.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Nurse!

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Don't think I'm weak, just because I'm a woman. I have Power. Give in, stop fighting me, Ethan. I always get what I want.

Speaker: nurse
Dialogue: Would you stop screaming. There are sick people trying to sleep.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Get her away from me.  She's crazy.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: They're over for you sweetheart.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Now you see who you're dealing with.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: This is your problem, right here. This girl's driving you insane, Ethan. Let me help you.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I don't want your help.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Come back to my house. My car's outside.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I never met a man I couldn't have--and you're no different from the rest!

Speaker: security officer
Dialogue: Okay, what's going on in h--

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Power of Shadow---seize him.

Speaker: nurse
Dialogue: Doctor, I think you' re going to have a gas problem.

Speaker: doctor
Dialogue: I shouldn't have had the cabbage at lunch.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Omigod.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Over by the window. It must be from my sister. Give him a tip, Jimmy.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Gosh, what do you suppose .that is?

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Well, Lucy, it's nice to see you're feeling better. Nice to meet you, Jimmy.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: You're not gonna stay for the ice cream?

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: I have to get back. I'm having dinner with the Danvers.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Again? You're getting real tight with them. You're gonna be a straight-A student---just kidding, thanks for coming.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Phillip! When are you gonna come see me?

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Can I give you a lift?

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: It's no trouble. I'd like to ask you some more questions.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Give up?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Never!

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: What goes up must come down.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: I probably would've got a ticket without this press pass on the windshield. Does Clark get many tickets?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: ...before you get blown off and kill yourself.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Say---you think that's the same guy who was in the accident with Lucy?

Speaker: linda
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: The scoop of the year!

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: It'll be dark soon. And cold. Come down while you've got the chance.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: No. She'll come for me. Like she did the last time. My angel.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: She's not coming for you. I killed her. She's dead.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: No. I don't believe you. It's not true. She's alive somewhere. My angel. My love--

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: There goes my Pulitzer Prize.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Darn!

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Hey lady, did you see that?

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: See what?

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: The girl---dressed like Superman--caught that guy in mid-air.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Really? Maybe you should check into the hospital and have your head examined.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: You're alive! She didn't kill you!

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: That woman who's after me. She hates you. Because she knows I love you.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: My angel. My goddess. I feel I've always loved you all my life. I'll die if I can't spend the rest of my life just looking at you, holding you in my arms...

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: We have to have a long talk about all this.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I know just the place. Hang a left at the Amalgamated Tower.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Home?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: No way. I'm not going to let that little hussy make a monkey out of me.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Is it her that's bothering you--or your gardener?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I use men, but I'm not addicted to them. I can quit whenever I want.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: This is my favourite place in the city.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Are you sure it's all right for us to be here?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: They don't care, they're tearing it down for a shopping centre.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Like it?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Yes. It reminds me of home.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Where Superman's from? Krypton?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: No. Argo City. It was on a chunk of rock that was part of Krypton once---but we moved it to inner space.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I'm sorry, I don't understand.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: It's not important. The important thing is I'm here to find something and I think you can he1p me.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Come on, let's ride.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I used to work here summers when I was a kid.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Ethan, tell me more about this woman who's after you.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Let's talk about us, not her.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Tell me where I can find her.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I don't want you to go near her. She's bad news.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: But be reasonable. If I don't do something to stop her she'll try again. And maybe hurt you.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I'll be safe with you. We can stay together the rest of our lives.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: We can't do that.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Why not ?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: We're from different worlds.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Just give me a chance to show how much I love you. Love changes everything. Love makes everything possib1e.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: All this talk about love, it's silly.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: You don't like me? You hate me?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Of Course I don't hate you. I  don't hate anyone.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: What do you feel about me?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I...I don't know. This is all so sudden.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: You're not afraid are you?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Of course not, but...there are things we don't understand.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: If we wait until we understand everything we'll be dead. Come on. You can learn more from one kiss than from years in school.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Well...I guess one is all right.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Terrific.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: What a touching scene!

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Who are you ?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I am Selena. Give him to me. Now. Or you'll both be sorry.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I don't scare that easily.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: All right, Miss Know-it-all. If I can't have him, nobody can.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Coffer of Shadow, show your Power!

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: That ought to keep you out of my hair for a while.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Supergirl'?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Yookoohoo! No, that's not it. Sis-o-reb! Nope. Ka-ma-hoochie!

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Sure glad you didn't let make a monkey of you.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Shut up, and get me a hacksaw.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: Why don't you use the Coffer of Shadow?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I don't feel like it right now.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: She didn't take it from you, did she?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: That little girl? Ha.  Now go on, get me some tools.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: There's no need. I learned the Craft from my                         grandmother.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Good. Now bring the car. We must call a meeting of the seven.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: There you are. Come to mama.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I thought I'd show you one of my favourite places.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: But I have to go back. I brought you here so you'd be safe. From her.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: You can't just abandon me.  Alone.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Great! I'II build a house-- right over there, with a veranda looking out to sea. And I'll plant a garden! Papayas, pineapples, bananas, mangoes--- anything'll grow here. And I'II fish in the lagoon, and we can go sailing in a dugout canoe, and---

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Well, maybe a little longer than that.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: You're more afraid of the President than me???

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Let us begin. I invoke the rule of seven.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: You better have a pretty good explanation for this, Selena.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: We are in great danger. A being has come to Earth with powers far beyond those of anyone member of the Craft.

Speaker: indian woman
Dialogue: But Superman has been away.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: It is not Superman I speak of, but his cousin Kara. She knows we exist..

Speaker: elderly man
Dialogue: Then she must be destroyed.

Speaker: elderly man
Dialogue: That is unimportant. Now that she knows, she will become curious and learn more. When she learns we plan to restore the ancient religion of this planet and avenge the centuries of persecution---she will try to stop us.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: We must destroy her first.

Speaker: erica
Dialogue: But how can we destroy her?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: By the Rite of Ultimate Power. One person must volunteer  to take on the combined power of us all.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: You! You want to take our power for yourself!

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Nige1, you know the one who takes on Ultimate Power must sacrifice the last sparks of her own spirit.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Which of you is willing to make that sacrifice?

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: You would! You revealed our existence so you could have all of our power.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Maybe you'd like to get rid of this Supergirl yourself, Nigel?

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: Why get rid of her at al1? You've used the Coffer of Shadow too much.  It is beginning to rule your heart.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Nonsense.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I invoke the rule of seven. Do you agree?

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: I have no choice.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Ethan, what IS wrong?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: She said it wouldn't last.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: What wouldn't last? What's the matter with you?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I don't love you any more.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Like turning off a light.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I feel awful. All that romantic garbage. All that mushy talk.  He lurches off into the undergrowth, toward the interior of the island. She plunges into the vegetation keeping pace with him.  SUPERGIRL Where are you going?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: But why?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Because you remind me of all the dumb things I said.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I sort of like what you said.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: That makes it worse.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: But I don't understand.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Of course you don't. We're from two different worlds, remember?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: At last. Ultimate Power.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: And the first thing we do is get rid of Supergirl!

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: What do you mean we?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Hi.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Hello. Are you still mad at me?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I'm not mad at you.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: It seemed that way to me.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I know I was acting funny---I'm sorry. It's just...I miss it.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: What I had before. What's not there now. It's like I woke up and found part of me wasn't there any more: something that made me feel really alive and aware of things. It was like, for the first time in my life, everything fitted together perfectly---you and me and the world around us--like we were a wonderful song...

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: And now?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: And now...the guitars are out of tune, and the words don't make sense, and somebody unplugged the mike...

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Well...I don It know much about these things, but maybe if you had that feeling once...it can, come back.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: But what if---it wasn't real?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Feelings are real. Once you've had them, they're yours forever.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Hey, listen, when all this blows over, maybe we could get together every now and then and see each other. And maybe something might. happen again. What do you think?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Are you asking me for a "date"?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Why not? You're a good-looking girl. And I'm--- available.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Aren't you forgetting about Selena?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: She'll forget about us eventually.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: There's something very dangerous about her. Something evil...

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I know what it is. She has this lead container shaped like a gargoyle. Inside there's a silvery ring...

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: That's the Power Source that was lost from Argo City! That's what I came: to find! Where does she live?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: In this big old house on Orchard Avenue---but you better stay away from there.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I can see through walls. I could surprise her. The only thing I can't see through is lead, that's why I didn't see the Power Source at the amusement park.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Wait. Don't leave me.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: You'll be safe here. I'll come back as soon as I have the Power Source.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: And you can see how you feel about me, right?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Ethan!

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Hey take it easy. I won't hurt you.

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: I thought .it was her, coming back. Spared me. But I thought. . . maybe changed her mind. Nigel warned us. Wouldn't listen to him.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: What are you talking about? Where's Selena?

Speaker: bianca
Dialogue: No. Don't want to know. She's bad. Don't go near her. Hurt you.

Speaker: nigel
Dialogue: Supergirl! She's waiting for you. On Taliesen Mountain. Stop her before it's too late!

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I'm wise to your tricks, lady.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I could force you.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: If that worked, you would've done it already. No, you want me to drink it of my own free will. Well let me tell you, sweetheart, it'll be a cold day in hell before I fall for that one again.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Go on,  talk big! I'll soon have you purring like a kitten.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: You've been without water for a whole day. Let's see how thirsty you get in a week.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Careful, don't make me angry. I start fires when I'm angry.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I told you I'd win.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Kiss me.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Ethan!

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Enjoy your prison, Supergirl. It's forever.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Ethan! Don't let her do this!

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: No. No. It isn't true.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: Mother? I can hardly hear you.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: I'm lost, Mother. In some awful place. I can't fly anymore. And I'm weak.

Speaker: alura's voice
Dialogue: Kara, you must not give up. We must retrieve the Power Source. The City is dying.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: Then send someone else. I failed.

Speaker: alura's voice
Dialogue: We can't. The' dimension barrier is stronger. We no longer have the power to push through.

Speaker: kara
Dialogue: But Mother, I'm lost.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Nations of the world! I bring you tidings of a new age!

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I bring you a return to the ancient true worship of Nature, our Sovereign Queen and Mother. And I bring you myself as her representative here on Earth.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: From this moment forth, all science, religion and other unnatural beliefs are forbidden. And in their place I will teach the One True Way of our ancient grandmothers.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: You are talking about the end of Civilisation as we know it.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: And it's about time too.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: I do not know who you are, or what evil force you represent, but it will take more than a few threats from you to make mankind turn back the clock and abandon thousands of years of progress.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Threats? I don't need threats to destroy civilisation. I have something better.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Zaltar.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Kara? Is it you?

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: This is the Phantom Zone. But why did you come here from Argo City?

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Earth? You crossed the dimension barrier? By yourself?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Yes. I went there to find the lost Power Source...

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: ...but the person who has it. tricked me, and sent me to the Phantom Zone.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: It's dangerous to use a Power Source on Earth. It can unleash all sorts of terrible forces---

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I know.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Well, nothing we can do about it. Come into my house. You can stay with me, until I build you your own place. I expect you won't want to mix with the others-- not our type of people.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Others?

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Criminals.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: A few hundred parasangs that way. I avoid them. And you should too.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Just feels, a little, like a tiny bit of Argo City...

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Yes. Can't seem to get away from that style. Must try something new.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: No, no. Not lovely. 'Perfect'. Did everything just right. Nobody telling you to change this, move that around. Please yourself. That's the secret of happiness.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Are you happy, Zaltar?

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: What kind of a question is that? Of course: I am. I do whatever I want. All the time.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: But what about other people? Don't you miss them?

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: I look at them all the time. Every planet in the galaxy. It's quite boring. Here, rub some of this onto that bruise.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: You look at them? How?

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: The Phantom Zone overlooks everywhere.. If you have the right tools.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: There you see? What could be more boring than that?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Wait. Could...could I see the place I just came from?

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: It'll only make you sad.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: This goes closer. This moves it around. And this begins.

Speaker: secretary
Dialogue: No more audiences today. Go home. All of you.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: They want me. Doesn't it make you proud?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Yeah.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Coming?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Smile, lunk-head. You're not a gardener any more, you're Prince Ethan now.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Told you. Wouldn't listen to me. Knew it would make you sad.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: No. I have to see this.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: I had to dump the papers in a trashcan. The Danvers have been arrested!

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: How do you know?

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: I saw them dragged out of the Administration Building.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: I can't help it if men notice me.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Lucy! Be serious. We could be executed for  treason!

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: I sure wish Superman was around. He wouldn't let any of this go on. Not for one minute.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: I wish they'd tell us what they're going to do with us.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: I heard stories.  I don't think you wanna know.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Hmmm?

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Remember me? We were in a disaster together.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Right! Say, do you swing any weight around here?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: A little.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Can you get us out? It's all a misunderstanding. We thought they were selling hamburgers in that place.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I'll mention it upstairs.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: The blonde girl who saved your life---where is she now?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: She's gone. No one will ever see her again.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Of course, my dear. What can I do?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Help me to get back to Earth. Where my friends are. They need me.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: There's no way out of the Zone. No one's ever escaped. That's why they send the criminals here.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: If there's a way in, there must be a way out.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: No, that's not true---there's well...no--

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: But it's impossible.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Why?

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: No, it wouldn't work, you couldn't, it's too--- if it didn't work you'd be swept into a singularity--- no, you'd never make it. Forget I mentioned it.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: I could do it.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: No, it's no good---you can't practice--- you only get one go. A thing like that. No. Sure you don't want a sip of this? It's delicious, I think.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Takes a long time, you know, learning the wand. Just begun to understand it myse1f. Give things a kind of life--can also take away life; works backwards too. Besides I can't let you take my wand. Only have the one, what would I do? I'd be helpless. It's out of the question.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Then come with me.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Leave the zone? What would I do on Earth?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: You could do anything. You could sculpt mountain ranges...draw with rainbows! You'd have superpowers.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Superpowers. Got you in a lot of trouble, didn't they?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Please. I have to get back to Earth. My friends are in trouble. And unless I bring back the Power Source, Argo City will die.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Oh, all right. Stop crying. Let's go.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: You're going to take me back?

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Going to try. Didn't say I could.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I heard my mother ask you once "how could a man with such a selfish heart create beauty?" She was wrong, Zaltar, you have a generous heart.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Not doing this for you. Just sick of this place, that's all. Wretched singing sculptures, always yowling at you. Boring!

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Hey, I thought you were gonna mention us upstairs.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I did.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Well thanks a pile, fella.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I don't know. You seem afraid.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: You're a regular Einstein, aren't you?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Supergirl?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Quit staring so hard. You'll strain your eyes.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: You're not going to hurt her, are you?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: You can't put her out of your mind, is that it?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Well...I guess I can't.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I'm ready for her. I'll show you.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Unless Supergirl agrees to go away forever, the serpents will drop them one by one.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Why the empty cage?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: That one was for you. But I thought I'd wait and see how you behave when Supergirl gets here. I'd hate to lose you, Ethan.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: What...?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: You don't get this far without paying...a certain price.

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: Remember? I was trying desperately to get you're attention.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: You were? You mean we could've been... you-know-what... all this time?

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Why didn't you tell me?

Speaker: lucy
Dialogue: You're supposed to guess.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Why are you stopping?

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Stopping? Was I? Silly. One thing you musn't do.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Oh dear!

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Good girl! That's the way!

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: You can use the wand.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Better than when I was a child.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: I remember you then. Cute thing you were. Like your mother.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: What's that? Never saw anything like that.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Don't stop. Keep moving.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: It's Selena. I'm getting so I can recognise her work.

Speaker: zaltar
Dialogue: Too late. Too late. Save yourself.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Zaltar!

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: You're not going to win, Selena. I won't let you.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Zaltar, Zaltar. You never had a selfish heart.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Wherever you are, Zaltar, thank 'you.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: You've had your fun, Selena, the game is over.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: The Danvers. And two of your little friends.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: It's just one more crime you'll have to pay for.

Speaker: jimmy
Dialogue: Hey, what gives?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: All right, Supergirl. The game's not over till the last card's dealt.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: You've run out of things to throw, Selena.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Not yet.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: It's her shadow-self! Her dark side!

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: How do I fight it?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: Turn it against her.

Speaker: real selena
Dialogue: Power of Shadow, kill her!!

Speaker: second selena
Dialogue: You are my shadow, you must obey me.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I've got it! The Power Source!

Speaker: real selena
Dialogue: No! Stop! Please!

Speaker: second selena
Dialogue: Thank you. I'll take this back to Argo City.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: It is you, then, really?

Speaker: second selena
Dialogue: Well?

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: It's you all right.

Speaker: second selena
Dialogue: I'll make it easy for you.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: I couldn't help what I did, before. She drugged me.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I never doubted you for a moment.

Speaker: real selena
Dialogue: Supergirl. Please! Help! I'm dying...

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: I'm free. I can never thank you enough.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: For what?

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Ever since I found that thing I've been like a prisoner in a terrible nightmare. You have no idea how awful it is to be mean all the time.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Your nightmares are over. I'm taking this back to Argo City where it won't be misused.  You could come too. It might be safer for you.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: No thanks. I have friends in the resistance. They'll vouch for me. I figure I might get a million bucks for my memoirs.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: I'll come back as soon as I can.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: What about me? They'll make, hash out of me around here.

Speaker: ethan
Dialogue: She's right. They'll string her up.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Do you want to come to Argo City?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: It's the most beautiful place in the universe.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: Grab hold of this. It forms a force field for the journey through inner space.

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: It's everywhere. But water is always the door.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Will they be angry with me for stealing the Power Source?

Speaker: supergirl
Dialogue: They'll be grateful. If you hadn't found it, it would still be lost. Look, up ahead.

Speaker: selena
Dialogue: Yes, I see it. Shining like a jewel.
